Country: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
Capital: Jamestown (Saint Helena),, Georgetown (Ascension Island),, Edinburgh of the Seven Seas (Tristan da Cunha)

Language: Afrikaans, English, Southern Ndebele, Northern Sotho, Southern Sotho, Swati, Tsonga, Tswana, Venda, Xhosa, Zulu

Capital: Dodoma (official),, Dar es Salaam (seat of government)
